parameters:
\bustMsgExp[1, 3]\bustMoveTo[1, 1300, 720, 30]\nc<Saki>Phew. It's the weekend, so maybe I'll take it easy? Though I
haven't done any real work yet...
\bustMsgExp[1, 1]\nc<Saki>Huh?! Is this... a call from Senpai?\bustMsgExp[1,0]Hello...?

\nc<Senpai>Our company operates on weekends too, so feel free to come
in if you want to work on a holiday.

\bustMsgExp[1, 2]\nc<Saki>(Please spare me...) Haha... I... got it! I'll think about
it!
